original_text: Jesus replied, ‘Think about those people from Galilee. Perhaps you think that they had done more bad things than other people from Galilee. Do you think that is why they had to die?
korean_text: 대답하여 이르시되 너희는 이 갈릴리 사람들이 이같이 해 받으므로 다른 모든 갈릴리 사람보다 죄가 더 있는 줄 아느냐

sentences.original_text: Think about those people from Galilee
sentences.korean_translation: 갈릴리에서 온 그 사람들을 생각해 보아라

sentences.original_text: that they had done more bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 더 많은 나쁜 일을 했다고

sentences.original_text: that is why they had to die
